New theme 15 Apr 2012

Felt like my blog needed a redo, so I threw together a new theme. It’s pretty heaviliy inspired by James Yu’s blog, with help from Twitter Bootstrap for code snippets and wells

Look, in-line code snippets: do_stuff is the name of a function.

And code-blocks:

100.times do |i|
  puts "#{i} is a pretty cool number"
end

Or just ordinary wells:

Doesn't putting this text in a well make you more likely to read it?

There’s also tweet and plus one buttons now, so you can all tell your friends how awesome you think I am, and disqus comments, so you can tell me how much I suck.

Still using jekyll with github pages for hosting.
